attr.title: Trolley Delayma
attr.desc: A compact puzzle game where you reroute tracks to save victims and stall the inevitable. Combine quick thinking with fast reactions as you try to rescue everyone -- yourself included.
attr.inst:
You can download Trolley Delayma free at: https://albertnez.itch.io/trolley-delayma 

Download the Linux version version and extract it, and place the trolley_delayma.run.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the linux_v1_0_1.zip release.
attr.inst_md:
You can download Trolley Delayma free at: https://albertnez.itch.io/trolley-delayma 

Download the Linux version version and extract it, and place the *trolley\_delayma.run.pck* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the *linux\_v1\_0\_1.zip* release.
